name: Pirates vs. Ninjas vs. Zombies vs. Pandas
name_original: Pirates vs. Ninjas vs. Zombies vs. Pandas
description:
Pirates vs. Ninjas vs. Zombies vs. Pandas is a puzzle game developed by Tactile Entertainment. It came out on 03-12-2010. It was published by PAN Vision.
Pirates vs. Ninjas vs. Zombies vs. Pandas is available on iOS.
